Module com.example.project4software_methodology
Package com.example.project4software_methodology

Class StoreOrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4software_methodology.StoreOrderController
public class StoreOrderController extends Object
Controller for managing store orders in the application. This class handles the UI logic for displaying, updating, and exporting orders. It interacts with the StoreOrder class to retrieve and manipulate order data.
Author:
Rohan Parikh & Ganesh Konda

  • Constructor Details

    • StoreOrderController

      public StoreOrderController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller. This method sets up the initial state of the controller and populates UI components.

    • populateOrderNumberChoiceBox

      private void populateOrderNumberChoiceBox()
      Populates the order number choice box with order numbers. This method clears the current items and adds all order numbers from the store orders.

    • addChoiceBoxListener

      private void addChoiceBoxListener()
      Adds a listener to the choice box to handle selection changes. This method updates the order list view when a new order number is selected.

    • updateOrdersListView

      private void updateOrdersListView(int orderNumber)
      Updates the orders list view based on the selected order number.
      Parameters:
      orderNumber - The order number for which details need to be displayed.

    • handleCancelOrder

      private void handleCancelOrder()
      Handles the action of cancelling an order. When invoked, it cancels the selected order and updates the UI components.

    • handleExportOrders

      private void handleExportOrders()
      Handles the action of exporting orders to a text file. This method opens a file chooser to select a save location and writes the order details to a file.

    • showWarning

      private void showWarning(String message)
      Displays a error message in a dialog box.
      Parameters:
      message - The error message to be displayed.

    • showInformation

      private void showInformation(String message)
      Displays a success message in a dialog box.
      Parameters:
      message - The success message to be displayed.
